Title: The Perfect Game
Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), Tonya Kong, Tonya Kong (story editor)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Jay Ali
Plot: To quell the rising backlash over his release, Fisk serves up a scapegoat to the FBI. Dex misses the mark when he runs into a woman from his past.
